info.title: 学习阶段
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

get.description: Muliple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

post.summary: 111111Updates a pet in the store with form data.
post.description: Updates a pet resource based on the form data.

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of pet that needs to be updated

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of pet that needs to be updated

put.description: Update an existing pet by Id.

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store.
post.description: Add a new pet to the store.

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

get.description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.
Returns a map of status codes to quantities.

post.summary: Place an order for a pet.
post.description: Place a new order in the store.

get.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value <= 5 or > 10. Other values will generate exceptions.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of order that needs to be fetched

delete.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value < 1000. Anything above 1000 or non-integers will generate API errors.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for login in clear text

X-Rate-Limit.description: calls per hour allowed by the user

X-Expires-After.description: date in UTC when token expires

get.summary: Logs out current logged in user session.
get.description: Log user out of the system.
Get user detail based on username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: name that need to be deleted

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be deleted

post.summary: Creates list of users with given input array

get.description:
首先第一步，获得Github的API，得到需要的信息
Github API官方文档：https://docs.github.com/en/rest/search

请求参数文档说明：https://docs.github.com/en/search-github/getting-started-with-searching-on-github/understanding-the-search-syntax


注意⚠️：
1. 此处的搜索依据为 GitHub 仓库 “repository”
2. 搜索结果的日期限制：最近1天内生成的

获取 Github 上 “Issues” 类别中关于 Apidog 的条目，日期限定范围为1天内

GitHub 官方文档 - Issue 介绍：https://docs.github.com/en/search-github/searching-on-github/searching-issues-and-pull-requests
获取 Github 上 “Commits” 类别中关于 Apidog 的条目，日期限定范围为1天内

post.description:
获取user_access_token: https://open.feishu.cn/document/authentication-management/access-token/get-user-access-token 

关于请求参数“code” - 获取授权码：https://open.feishu.cn/document/authentication-management/access-token/obtain-oauth-code

access_token.description: 即为user_access_token，仅在请求成功时返回

expires_in.description: 非固定值，请务必根据响应体中返回的实际值来确定 access_token 的有效期

refresh_token.description: 用于刷新 user_access_token，仅在请求成功且用户授予 offline_access 权限时返回。

refresh_token_expires_in.description: 非固定值，请务必根据响应体中返回的实际值来确定 refresh_token 的有效期

scope.description: 本次请求所获得的 access_token 所具备的权限列表，以空格分隔，仅在请求成功时返回

example.error_description: An unexpected server error occurred. Please retry your request.

post.description:
飞书官方文档：https://open.feishu.cn/document/server-docs/im-v1/message/create?appId=cli_a840c7597e92100e

将从GitHub API上获得的信息通过飞书API发送到群聊

关于获取用户的 Open ID：https://open.feishu.cn/document/faq/trouble-shooting/how-to-obtain-openid

parameters.name: receive_id_type
parameters.description: 用户 ID 类型/群聊 ID

post.description: 用的是阿里云的链接🔗，但key是DeepSeek 官方申请的key，不太行
